titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 655) to authorize the hydrogen research, development, and demonstration programs of the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-108, by Mr. Quillen.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 655 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 42.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/1/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the open rule for consideration of H.R. 655 (hydrogen research, development, and demonstration programs).
